channel.title: RSCEasy dupe/wipe
channel.description:
Okay many of you might not know me , well actually no none of you know me. But i might be known as p u r i t y/f 3 a r in elitepk which is based on rsceasy. well look basicly what im trying to prove, well ill just post pictures.
Well i was in an area with another friend of mine(dragon427) training on fire giants, and all of a sudden i realize that in '::say' there is a 'EVO M R' spamming it a bit and i find that weird because there is a 20second spam limit, which made that impossible. So for some reason i pressed ::onlinelist and saw that there was 4 EVOs, one which was the real evo and the rest were fakes who were owned by dragon427 but he didnt know how much damage this could do. I wondered how that was possible and then i remembered that my character got wiped because i typed an "\" after my name in the login screen. So then i thought hmm lets try something out and i tell dragon427 to get near me, which he does, and in the new client that i opened up i logged in as "dragon427\" with a random password. Next thing you know hes wiped and reset back to level 3. Then immediately reported it to a mod and we went to the mod room, which i later got accused of wiping the accounts lmao when i was the one who reported it. While we were in the mod room, evo logged into another client with his same name and the same password which made sort of a "clone" of him with the same stats and same items. He immediately logged out but then i got the idea that you could just trade an item from the clone to your real account which would make you have 2 of that item obviously. So i tested my theory, and i was right. I made 2 sleeping bags and even after i logged out and back in, i still had 2 sleeping bags. The images below are pretty self explanatory.
[img]http://i28.tinypic.com/nxpe1i.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/wk1r39.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/34fmqty.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i26.tinypic.com/9q8pya.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/1f3p5.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/a47f4y.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/1h4baa.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/33c3e47.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/2s664r7.jpg[/img]
Now the thing about is, for some reason it doesnt work on servers that are based on rsceasy but have the "space problem" where you cant create a character that has a space in the name. But if you can create a name such as "d i e" then it is completely possible and easy to an extent. And characters that have spaces in them are harder to wipe, but characters that have 12 characters in there name [u]cannot[/u] be wiped at all. Well yup thats my story.

item.title: RSCEasy dupe/wipe
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Divinity:

Adu, are you releasing a fix for your name spaces patch today?

Yes.

For anyone wanting the fix to this goto http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,365538.msg2772507.html#msg2772507 and download the src files. More specifically the fix is in org.rscdaemon.server.io.PlayerLoader.

IMPORTANT: Make sure you delete all users in the /player folder that have a special character (or space) at the end or the beginning of thier username. If players have spaces in between numbers or alphabets DON’T delete them.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: RSCEasy dupe/wipe
item.dc:creator: @c.r.e.a.m c.r.e.a.m.
item.description:
@c.r.e.a.m wrote:

[quote=“lol k, post:6, topic:296739”]lol reborn i just tried on ur server lawls
and for some reason i fully dont under stand this…[/quote]
How hard is it to understand. You can clone yourself and sort of dupe your whole character because rsceasy doesnt need you to register accounts through forum or soemthing, its made as soon as you login.

Read full topic
